00008 FloatHistogram1D::FloatHistogram1D(UInt_t id, const HistPar &binning)
00009 {
00010   _obj = new lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl(kNHistogram1DInts,kNHistogram1DFloats+binning.nBins()+2,kNHistogram1DDoubles) ;
00011   _createdObject=true;
00012   _obj->setIntVal(kHistogram1DId,id);
00013   setBinning(binning);
00014   reset();
00015 }

00035 void FloatHistogram1D::reset()
00036 {
00037   _obj->setDoubleVal(kHistogram1DEntries,0.);
00038   for (UInt_t bin_i=0; bin_i<=overflowBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00039     setBinContent(bin_i,0);
00040   }
00041 }
00042 
00043 Float_t FloatHistogram1D::mean() const 
00044 {
00045   Double_t sum=0; 
00046   UInt_t bin_i;
00047   Float_t x=xMin();
00048   Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/nBins();
00049   x+=x_step*.5;
00050   for (bin_i=firstBinIndex(); bin_i<=lastBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00051     sum+=x*binContent(bin_i);
00052     x+=x_step;
00053   }
00054   Double_t n=entries()-overflow()-underflow();
00055   if (n>0) {
00056     sum/=n;
00057   }
00058   return sum;
00059 }
00060 
00061 Float_t FloatHistogram1D::rms() const 
00062 {
00063   Double_t sum=0; 
00064   Double_t sum2=0; 
00065   UInt_t bin_i;
00066   Float_t x=xMin();
00067   Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/nBins();
00068   x+=x_step*.5;
00069   for (bin_i=firstBinIndex(); bin_i<=lastBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00070     sum+=x*binContent(bin_i);
00071     sum2+=sqr(x)*binContent(bin_i);
00072     x+=x_step;
00073   }
00074   Double_t n=entries()-overflow()-underflow();
00075   if (n>1) {
00076     Double_t mean=sum/n;
00077     sum2=(sum2-mean*sum)/(n);
00078     return sqrt(sum2);
00079   }
00080   else {
00081     return 0.;
00082   }
00083 }
00084 
00085 Float_t FloatHistogram1D::variance() const 
00086 {
00087   Double_t sum=0; 
00088   Double_t sum2=0; 
00089   UInt_t bin_i;
00090   Float_t x=xMin();
00091   Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/nBins();
00092   x+=x_step*.5;
00093   for (bin_i=firstBinIndex(); bin_i<=lastBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00094     sum+=x*binContent(bin_i);
00095     sum2+=sqr(x)*binContent(bin_i);
00096     x+=x_step;
00097   }
00098   Double_t n=entries()-overflow()-underflow()-1;
00099   if (n>1) {
00100     Double_t mean=sum/n;
00101     sum2=(sum2-mean*sum)/(n);
00102     return sum2;
00103   }
00104   else {
00105     return 0.;
00106   }
00107 }

00109 Double_t FloatHistogram1D::integral(UInt_t first_bin, UInt_t last_bin) const 
00110 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00111   throw(std::range_error)
00112 #endif
00113 {
00114 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00115   rangeCheck(first_bin);
00116   rangeCheck(last_bin);
00117 #endif
00118   Double_t sum=0; 
00119   for (UInt_t bin_i=first_bin; bin_i<=last_bin; bin_i++) {
00120     sum+=binContent(bin_i);
00121   }
00122   return sum;
00123 }
